attributes.action: Give a proper answer to petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give a proper answer to the petitions, and not refer people who signed a petition back to local councils etc, obviously people are asking the manager (prime minister) to intervene because they have tried local authorities and have got nowhere, after all it is the English football team manager that is sacked if the team don’t do well

rejection.details: Please email your comments on petitions to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
